reviewText: The begining showed promise of a plot but then it gave way to non-stop fighting but since there was no background given it was pointless.

The Drunken monk, Mark Long, and the 13 Pole fighters of shaolin come together to hold off the forces of the Manchu Master played again by Alan Hsu(golden crane).  Another well choreographed monk film, with an alright  plot.  Worth a watch.
